name: WP Copy Data Protector
author: Rupesh Jorkar(RJ)

sections.description:
WP Content Copy Data Protector is a plugin that protect your blog contents, drage image, right click and Disable keyboard shortcuts CTRL A, C, X, U and P. and its tested in IE 9 and IE 10.

Features

-> This plugin Tested in IE9, IE10, Firefox, Google Chorme, Opera.
-> Disables right click function
-> Disables image drag and drop function
-> Disables ‘Hold to Copy’ function
-> Show message when Javascript is disabled
-> When Javascript is disable then this plugin forced user to enable JavaScript
-> Disables keyboard copy commands (CTRL A, C, X, U, P) copy/paste/print/view source
* The image link URL is automatically removed and defaulted to the ‘none’ setting in your image upload settings (deters image theft)

Feedback, Questions, Help, Bug Reporting, and Suggestions

Just post a mail to: rupeshat1988@gmail.com / Email Subject : WP Copy Data Protector
sections.installation:
1. Download the .zip file
  2. Upload or extract the contents of WP Wp-Copy-Data-Protector.zip to your wp-content/plugins/folder
  3. Activate the wp-copy-data-protector plugin in your WP-admin / Plugins

short_description: Then WP Copy Data Protector plugin block copy data, Content etc...
